h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff Location
content: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cloud-Patterned_Stone_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.
